pages.text: Concept core is a kind of space crystal with a corresponding vanilla machinery inside. To use them, you need an $(l:io_tools/interoperation_wand)Interoperation Wand$() or a $(l:io_tools/world_interoperator)World Interoperator$() machine.
Concept cores will enter a cooling time after use, and its value varies according to the type of concept core.
The effect of each concept core can be checked from other entries.
